title: How to easily write my assignment - Quora

response.answer_text: Assignment writing is given to test the student’s knowledge and it is not tough as it seems to be. When the word count is huge or you do not like the subject then assignment writing becomes tough. One should have the habit of reading and writing in order to develop an interest in writing. The habit of reading and writing should be inculcated in a person since the time he/she is admitted to a school. If a student makes a note of all the readings and explanations provided by a particular teacher in a class then he/she comes about the latter’s expectations. Likewise, notes should be maintained at the college and university level. There are certain tips that can be followed in order to write assignments and the discussion in the following paragraphs will help in completing assignments. A student should jot down the live lectures being provided by the professors in case it is missed the same should be borrowed from others. The small details provided by the professor cannot be found in any other sources. So when you have received an assignment, you need to focus on how your professor wants the assignment to be completed. Every professor wants his students to reflect what he or she has understood a particular subject while attending the classes whether the latter was active or dormant at the time of lecture delivery. Every assignment has a predefined format and pattern which needs to be followed while writing. When you get an assignment along with it you get a topic, a requirement as well as a rubric file. Requirement file has details about the assignment and it states about the points that are to be included in the assignment. It provides a detail on how the matter related to the topic has to be written. The rubric file details the weightage about each and every point that has been mentioned in the required file. It provides certain tips basis which higher grades can be achieved from each and every section of the assignment. Once you are clear with your topic, you have the lecture notes and the materials that can help in completing the assignment then you are ready to start writing your assignment. You need to manage your time so that you finish your assignment before the due date. In case you are unable to write the assignment as the topic is unclear or you are stuck in between, you can approach your professor to help you out. In today’s era searching the internet for each and every problem is on full bloom, you can get help from different sites on how to write assignments. There is a possibility that while searching you may come across an assignment or a piece of writing related to your topic. You can definitely take an idea about the format and how to present the content but do not simply copy the content from there as it may lead to high plagiarism when the work is checked through the plagiarism checker. When you are finished with your writing, entire work with the provided requirement and the rubric file needs to be checked in order to ensure that you have answered all the points or not. Once done you need to check whether all the sources are correctly formatted or not then quick proofreading is required. The last step is to check the plagiarism of the work. In case it is within the acceptable limits then you can submit the work but in case it is beyond the limits then you need to paraphrase the plagiarized parts, once done you can submit the work. By following the above tips and having confidence in yourself, you can definitely write and complete any assignment given to you.
